testcase.name: Tc01 arama testi
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici marktplaats anasayfaya gider................................passed And "iphone 7" icin arama yapar.............................................passed Then sonucun "iphone 7" icerdigini kontrol eder.............................passed And kullanici anasayfayi kapatir............................................passed

testcase.name: Tc01 arama testi 2
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici marktplaats anasayfaya gider................................passed And "iphone x" icin arama yapar.............................................passed Then sonucun "iphone x" icerdigini kontrol eder.............................passed And kullanici anasayfayi kapatir............................................passed
